name: Johncena
tagline: A game hacked together with ruby and gosu
body:
### Put together but unorganized.
Everything works, was put together by looking at multiple game examples and tutorials involving Gosu

### Gosu
A ruby game "engine" that feels very hacky
http://www.rubydoc.info/github/jlnr/gosu/Gosu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
